Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint, song in honour of
_description: A song in honour of St Thomas of Canterbury — six quatrains (abab) and Latin burden: ‘Pastor cesus in gregys medio / Pacem emit cruorys precio’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
As storys wryght & specyfySent thomas thorow goddes
                    sond…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…conserue vs al both nyght & daythorow þe schedyng of
                    thomas blood
BodEngPoete1.Editions:
Wright,  Thomas,
                        ed.  
             Songs and Carols from a manuscript…of the Fifteenth
                Century.
Percy Society
         23. London: Richards, 1847: 51-2.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 73-4; 1977, 61.
